Class DrawbridgeAnimationComponent

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.structures.drawbridge.DrawbridgeAnimationComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAnimationComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class DrawbridgeAnimationComponent extends Object implements IAnimationComponent
Represents a Animator for Drawbridges.

Pim
